ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Help
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sorry for the triple post, my mouse went nuts when i clicked on reply and ended sending 2 blank replies before i got a window to stay open... Matt
ygData.messageBody:
Matthew Bond wrote:
> badbrad112@... wrote:
>> Hi everyone.. i have tried to creat a new account after a long time
>> off of everquest but i can't find my original cd case! I can't find
>> what the account number is (cd number) for the original everquest if
>> anyone could please post what the cd key is i would be very
>> thankful. You are in no danger, i phoned a everquest help line and
>> they said that all the CD codes are the same so its not like i can
>> steal your accounts or anything... any help would be great
>
> Yeah, right....
>
> Each CD Key *is* different, and can only be used once.
>
> If you want a new account you need a new CD Key, as your original one
> is still tied to your original account (and ours are all used to make
> our accounts and can't be reused anyway). If you can remember your
> username and password you can just reactivate your old account. It
> will still be there as the don't delete inactive acounts.

Sorry for the triple post, my mouse went nuts when i clicked on reply
and ended sending 2 blank replies before i got a window to stay open...

Matt
